item.title: About
item.description: Jom Research, is an academic consultant platform owned by TMH Research Kits Resources (SSM registration no: 202303206919), a company based in Malaysia. Jom Research was founded with the specific purpose of offering easily accessible webinars centered around research and statistical analysis at a reasonable price point. What sets Jom Research apart is its commitment to providing a comprehensive learning journey, starting from the foundational basics and progressing seamlessly to more advanced topics in the realm of research and statistical analysis.

item.title: Consultation

item.title: Trainers
item.description: Lead academic trainer: Link to heading Name: Tengku Muhammad Hanis Bin Tengku Mokhtar Education: PhD student (Public Health Epidemiology, USM) MSc (Medical Statistics, USM) MBBCh (Al-Azhar University) Experience: Successfully run several workshops on bibliometric analysis, systematic reviews, and meta-analysis Published more than fifteen papers in Web of Science- and Scopus-indexed journal Research interest: Medical statistics, systematic review, bibliometrics, meta-analysis Machine learning, deep learning, text analysis R and Python application in medical research
